tool_description: Real-Time & Accurate Advanced Search Engine Results. REST API for SERP and SEO data. - More at: bishopi.io
title: Advanced SERP Operators

api_list.name: get-related-search-terms
api_list.description: Related searches in Google search

optional_parameters.name: location
optional_parameters.description: Specify the proxy location for the search. Supported countries. 'US', 'CA', 'IE', 'GB', 'FR', 'DE', 'SE', 'IN', 'JP', 'KR', 'SG', 'AU', 'BR'
